alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Grant; Richland (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 8:02AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Grant, Richland and east central Crawford Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 802 AM CDT, the public reported a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Boscobel, or 13 miles southwest of Richland Center, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Richland Center around 820 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include County Roads D And N N, Highway 61 And County T, Eagle Cave, Horrigan Ridge, Plugtown, Ithaca, Eagle Corners, Loyd, Bunker Hill and Highway 58 And County B. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
